items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t yet know whether he can go or not.
Tom dropped by Mary\'s house just to say hello.
Tom definitely earns more money than Mary does.
Tom definitely knows what Mary wants him to do.
Tom definitely needs to be a bit more sociable.
I\'m looking forward to spending time with Tom.
I\'m looking forward to visiting Tom in Boston.
I\'m much better at reading French than Tom is.
I\'m not sure that I understand what Tom meant.
Since my mother was sick, I couldn\'t go there.
